The DQN agent¶

class DQN.DAgent(gamma, epsilon, lr, input_dims, batch_size, n_actions, mem_size=1000000, eps_end=0.01, eps_dec=0.996)¶

The agent class that will be controlling the environment.rst.

Parameters

  • gamma – The discount factor for the Q-values update

  • epsilon – The probability for epsilon-greedy approach

  • lr – The learning rate

  • input_dims – The number of input dimensions (how many variables characterise the state)

  • batch_size – The batch size

  • n_actions – The number of actions that can be performed

  • mem_size – The number of transitions that should be stored

  • eps_end – The minimum epsilon that should be achieved

  • eps_dec – The decay applied to epsilon after each epoch

optimize_model()¶

Runs one optimization step if there is enough experience in the replay memory.

select_action(state)¶

Selects the next action via an epsilon-greedy approach based on a state

Parameters

state (Tensor) – The state for which the action should be chosen

Returns

Returns the selected action

class DQN.DeepQNetwork(lr, input_dims, fc_1_dims, fc_2_dims, n_actions)¶

Deep Q Network for the heating control problem.

Parameters

  • lr (Float) – The learning rate

  • input_dims (Integer) – The number of input dimensions (based on the variables explaining the state)

  • fc_1_dims (Integer) – The number of neurons for the first fully-connected layer

  • fc_2_dims (Integer) – The number of neurons for the second fully-connected layer

  • n_actions (Integer) – The number of actions that can be selected

forward(observation)¶

This method does one forward-pass for the Q-network.

Parameters

observation – The observation ( or state) for which we want to compute the Q-values

Returns

A Tensor with Q-values associated to each state

class DQN.ReplayMemory(capacity)¶

This class serves as storage capability for the replay memory. It stores the Transition tuple (state, action, next_state, reward) that can later be used by a DQN agent for learning based on experience replay.

Parameters

capacity (Integer) – The size of the replay memory

push(*args)¶

Saves a transition. (the transition tuple)

sample(batch_size)¶

Randomly selects batch_size elements from the memory.

Parameters

batch_size (Integer) – The wanted batch size

Returns

class DQN.Transition(state, action, next_state, reward)¶
action¶

Alias for field number 1

next_state¶

Alias for field number 2

reward¶

Alias for field number 3

state¶

Alias for field number 0
